what_is.question: What is Web Memo?
what_is.answer: Web Memo is a service that makes your web surfing more convenient. You can easily save and manage important information. With just one click, you can take notes, get AI-powered summaries, and organize information systematically.

is_free.question: Is Web Memo free to use?
is_free.answer: Yes, of course! All basic features of Web Memo are free. You can freely use all core features including note-taking, basic organization, AI-powered content summaries, and wishlist functionality.

where_to_save.question: Where can I save my notes?
where_to_save.answer: You can easily save notes anywhere through the Chrome extension. No matter which website you're viewing, you can quickly jot down notes!

where_to_find.question: Where can I find my saved notes?
where_to_find.answer: You can access your saved notes anytime by logging into the Web Memo website. You can view and manage all your notes at a glance!

memo_preservation.question: Will my notes be preserved?
memo_preservation.answer: Don't worry! Even our developers have stored over 500 notes in this service. We plan to preserve your valuable memo data permanently. Furthermore, we're planning to add features that will allow you to download your memos in csv or json format, so rest assured!

how_ai_works.question: How does the AI summary feature work?
how_ai_works.answer: The AI summary feature is really smart! It automatically analyzes webpage content and extracts only the key points. Thanks to this, you can understand long content in just a few seconds, saving you a lot of time.

other_browsers.question: Can I use it on browsers other than Chrome?
other_browsers.answer: Currently, it's only available on Chrome browser. But don't worry! We're working hard to make it available on other browsers. We'll be the first to let you know when we have a specific release schedule!
